version_description: - fix for the screen edge touches for the standalone app version. Now, if you tap the controls (or keys), which are close to the right (or left) edge of the screen, they will work without a delay.
- fixed bug when the first note was rendered silent when using "Freeze audio" function in Cubasis and Garage Band apps with Poison-202 Audio Unit.

- important bug fixes and stability improvements for the Audio Unit version;
- added push notification service for notifying about JimAudio news and special offers.

- fixed crash upon entering "Bluetooth Midi Devices" configuration menu;
- maximum supported buffer size is increased to 2048.
Bug fixed for the new iPad Air (4th gen) display resolution: interface did not fully fit the screen vertically.
